>
[Gyroscopic Stabilizer](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1588)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Outlaws of Alkenstar</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 77

**Price** 115 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** attached to a two-handed firearm

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _gyroscopic stabilizer_ appears as a gold disk suspended within three rotating golden bands inside a gilded case, itself attached to a set of clamps. These clamps allow you to attach the _gyroscopic stabilizer_ to any one-handed firearm as an Interact action.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per hour;  **Requirements** The _gyroscopic stabilizer_ is attached to a one-handed firearm without the [fatal](/Traits.aspx?ID=178) or [fatal aim](/Traits.aspx?ID=404) traits; **Effect** The gyroscopic stabilizer begins spinning for 1 minute. While the gyroscopic stabilizer is spinning, the weapon it's attached to gains the fatal aim weapon trait with a die one size larger than its damage die (maximum d12). This allows you to wield it in two hands to grant it the fatal trait.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
